Topic.Title: Create an exit with "tell about" feature

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, 
I am attempting to create an exit by having my player tell or ask an NPC something, and I thought I set it up correctly, but nothing happens when I try to ask/tell about the exit. 

Thank you in advance!
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: You will probably want to execute the make exit visible script.  So, make the exit but toggle it as not visible.  Then, when you ask about the exit, run a script to make it visible.
